languages.text: {n}Тепло улыбнувшись, Иокаста мягко произносит:{/n} "Позвольте мне. В моих он не умрет — я ему не разрешу".
{n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."
languages.original_text: {n}Тепло улыбнувшись, Иокаста мягко произносит:{/n} "Позвольте мне. В моих он не умрет — я ему не разрешу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

{n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."
{n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas habla con una sonrisa.{/n} «Por favor, permítame. No morirá en mis manos. No se lo permitiré».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas habla con una sonrisa.{/n} «Por favor, permítame. No morirá en mis manos. No se lo permitiré».

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが温かい笑みを浮かべて言う。{/n}「どうか許可を。奴は私の手で死ぬことはありません。死なせはしない」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが温かい笑みを浮かべて言う。{/n}「どうか許可を。奴は私の手で死ぬことはありません。死なせはしない」

languages.text: {n}戒律大师开了口，脸上带着温暖的笑意。{/n}“请允许我来吧。他绝不会死在我手上，我是不会让他得逞的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师开了口，脸上带着温暖的笑意。{/n}“请允许我来吧。他绝不会死在我手上，我是不会让他得逞的。”

languages.text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms sagt mit einem warmen Lächeln:{/n} "Bitte gestattet. Er wird nicht durch meine Hand sterben. Ich lasse ihn nicht sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms sagt mit einem warmen Lächeln:{/n} "Bitte gestattet. Er wird nicht durch meine Hand sterben. Ich lasse ihn nicht sterben."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes prend la parole avec un sourire enthousiaste :{/n} « Avec votre permission... Je vous garantis qu'il ne mourra pas entre mes mains. Je ne le laisserai pas faire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes prend la parole avec un sourire enthousiaste :{/n} « Avec votre permission... Je vous garantis qu'il ne mourra pas entre mes mains. Je ne le laisserai pas faire. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, sıcacık bir gülümsemeyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Lütfen bana müsaade edin. Ben onu öldürmem. Ölmesine göz yummam."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms says with a warm smile,{/n} "Please, allow me. He won't die by my hand. I won't let him."
